# The Saddle King (1921 film)

| runtime        = 20 minutes
| country        = United States
| language       = SilentEnglish intertitles
}}
The Saddle King is a 1921 American short silent Western film directed by Edward Laemmle and featuring Hoot Gibson.
Plot
Cast
* Hoot Gibson
* Charles Newton
* Dorothy Wood
* Jim Corey
